full_title: i wish i hated you by Ariana Grande
title: i wish i hated you

description.plain:
This is a highly emotional song about not villifying an ex.

Grande’s fanbase refers to as the “ghostin” of eternal sunshine, as Grande has specified that she will never perform “ghostin”, track eight of thank u, next, live because of its emotionality and personal meaning to her. As she told Zach Lang:

[‘i wish i hated you’ is] one of those [songs where] I’m so glad that [the] feeling is captured on [eternal sunshine], but it’s one that I [probably] won’t listen to […] or sing live […], but I think it’s […] a very important color to exist within the album.

embed_content: Read “i wish i hated you” by Ariana Grande on Genius
recording_location: Jungle Studios (New York, NY), MXM Studios (Stockholm, SE) and Decoy Studios (Suffolk, UK)

album.full_title: eternal sunshine deluxe: brighter days ahead (instrumental version) by Ariana Grande
album.name: eternal sunshine deluxe: brighter days ahead (instrumental version)

Grande’s fanbase refers to as the “ghostin” of eternal sunshine, as Grande has specified that she will never perform “ghostin”, track eight of… Read More 
Hung all my clothes in the closet you made
Your shoes still in boxes, I send them your way
Hoping life brings you no new pain

I rearrange my memories
I try to rewrite our life

But no matter how I try to (Mm)
And no matter how I want to (Mm)
And no matter how easy things could be if I did
And no matter how guilty I still feel saying it
I wish I hated you
I wish that weren't true
Wish there was worse to you
I wish you were worse to me
Yeah, I wish I hated you

Our shadows dance in a parallel plane
Just two different endings, you learn to repair
And I learn to keep me in one place

So close (So close) and yet so far (So far)
If only we had known from the start

But no matter how I try to (Mm)
And no matter how I want to (Mm)
And no matter how easy things could be if I did
And no matter how guilty I still feel saying it
I wish I hated you
I wish that weren't true
Wish there was worse to you
I wish you were worse to me
Yeah, I wish I hated you
